package main

import (
	"fmt"
	"strings"
	"net/http"
	"io/ioutil"
)

func main() {

	url := "https://apisetu.gov.in/bhartiaxagi/v3/cripc/certificate"

	payload := strings.NewReader("{\"certificateParameters\":{\"FullName\":\"Sunil Kumar\",\"PolicyNumber\":\"J9132102\"},\"consentArtifact\":{\"consent\":{\"consentId\":\"ea9c43aa-7f5a-4bf3-a0be-e1caa24737ba\",\"data\":{\"id\":\"string\"},\"dataConsumer\":{\"id\":\"string\"},\"dataProvider\":{\"id\":\"string\"},\"permission\":{\"access\":\"string\",\"dateRange\":{\"from\":\"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z\",\"to\":\"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z\"},\"frequency\":{\"repeats\":0,\"unit\":\"string\",\"value\":0}},\"purpose\":{\"description\":\"string\"},\"timestamp\":\"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z\",\"user\":{\"email\":\"string\",\"idNumber\":\"string\",\"idType\":\"string\",\"mobile\":\"string\"}},\"signature\":{\"signature\":\"string\"}},\"format\":\"pdf\",\"txnId\":\"f7f1469c-29b0-4325-9dfc-c567200a70f7\"}")

	req, _ := http.NewRequest("POST", url, payload)

	req.Header.Add("X-APISETU-APIKEY", "REPLACE_KEY_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("content-type", "application/json")

	res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

	defer res.Body.Close()
	body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

	fmt.Println(res)
	fmt.Println(string(body))

}

require 'uri'
require 'net/http'
require 'openssl'

url = URI("https://apisetu.gov.in/bhartiaxagi/v3/cripc/certificate")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)

http.verify_mode = OpenSSL::SSL::VERIFY_NONE

request = Net::HTTP::Post.new(url)
request["X-APISETU-APIKEY"] = 'REPLACE_KEY_VALUE'
request["content-type"] = 'application/json'
request.body = "{\"certificateParameters\":{\"FullName\":\"Sunil Kumar\",\"PolicyNumber\":\"J9132102\"},\"consentArtifact\":{\"consent\":{\"consentId\":\"ea9c43aa-7f5a-4bf3-a0be-e1caa24737ba\",\"data\":{\"id\":\"string\"},\"dataConsumer\":{\"id\":\"string\"},\"dataProvider\":{\"id\":\"string\"},\"permission\":{\"access\":\"string\",\"dateRange\":{\"from\":\"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z\",\"to\":\"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z\"},\"frequency\":{\"repeats\":0,\"unit\":\"string\",\"value\":0}},\"purpose\":{\"description\":\"string\"},\"timestamp\":\"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z\",\"user\":{\"email\":\"string\",\"idNumber\":\"string\",\"idType\":\"string\",\"mobile\":\"string\"}},\"signature\":{\"signature\":\"string\"}},\"format\":\"pdf\",\"txnId\":\"f7f1469c-29b0-4325-9dfc-c567200a70f7\"}"

import Foundation

let headers = [
  "X-APISETU-APIKEY": "REPLACE_KEY_VALUE",
  "content-type": "application/json"
]
let parameters = [
  "certificateParameters": [
    "FullName": "Sunil Kumar",
    "PolicyNumber": "J9132102"
  ],
  "consentArtifact": [
    "consent": [
      "consentId": "ea9c43aa-7f5a-4bf3-a0be-e1caa24737ba",
      "data": ["id": "string"],
      "dataConsumer": ["id": "string"],
      "dataProvider": ["id": "string"],
      "permission": [
        "access": "string",
        "dateRange": [
          "from": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
          "to": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z"
        ],
        "frequency": [
          "repeats": 0,
          "unit": "string",
          "value": 0
        ]
      ],
      "purpose": ["description": "string"],
      "timestamp": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
      "user": [
        "email": "string",
        "idNumber": "string",
        "idType": "string",
        "mobile": "string"
      ]
    ],
    "signature": ["signature": "string"]
  ],
  "format": "pdf",
  "txnId": "f7f1469c-29b0-4325-9dfc-c567200a70f7"
] as [String : Any]

let postData = JSONSerialization.data(withJSONObject: parameters, options: [])

let request = NSMutableURLRequest(url: NSURL(string: "https://apisetu.gov.in/bhartiaxagi/v3/cripc/certificate")! as URL,
                                        cachePolicy: .useProtocolCachePolicy,
                                    timeoutInterval: 10.0)
request.httpMethod = "POST"
request.allHTTPHeaderFields = headers
request.httpBody = postData as Data

let session = URLSession.shared
let dataTask = session.dataTask(with: request as URLRequest, completionHandler: { (data, response, error) -> Void in
  if (error != nil) {
    print(error)
  } else {
    let httpResponse = response as? HTTPURLResponse
    print(httpResponse)
  }
})

dataTask.resume()

api_call:
package main

import (
	"fmt"
	"strings"
	"net/http"
	"io/ioutil"
)

func main() {

	url := "https://apisetu.gov.in/bhartiaxagi/v3/cvipc/certificate"

	payload := strings.NewReader("{\"certificateParameters\":{\"FullName\":\"Sunil Kumar\",\"PolicyNumber\":\"J9132102\"},\"consentArtifact\":{\"consent\":{\"consentId\":\"ea9c43aa-7f5a-4bf3-a0be-e1caa24737ba\",\"data\":{\"id\":\"string\"},\"dataConsumer\":{\"id\":\"string\"},\"dataProvider\":{\"id\":\"string\"},\"permission\":{\"access\":\"string\",\"dateRange\":{\"from\":\"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z\",\"to\":\"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z\"},\"frequency\":{\"repeats\":0,\"unit\":\"string\",\"value\":0}},\"purpose\":{\"description\":\"string\"},\"timestamp\":\"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z\",\"user\":{\"email\":\"string\",\"idNumber\":\"string\",\"idType\":\"string\",\"mobile\":\"string\"}},\"signature\":{\"signature\":\"string\"}},\"format\":\"pdf\",\"txnId\":\"f7f1469c-29b0-4325-9dfc-c567200a70f7\"}")

	req, _ := http.NewRequest("POST", url, payload)

	req.Header.Add("X-APISETU-APIKEY", "REPLACE_KEY_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("content-type", "application/json")

	res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

	defer res.Body.Close()
	body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

	fmt.Println(res)
	fmt.Println(string(body))

}

import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("apisetu.gov.in")

payload = "{\"certificateParameters\":{\"FullName\":\"Sunil Kumar\",\"PolicyNumber\":\"J9132102\"},\"consentArtifact\":{\"consent\":{\"consentId\":\"ea9c43aa-7f5a-4bf3-a0be-e1caa24737ba\",\"data\":{\"id\":\"string\"},\"dataConsumer\":{\"id\":\"string\"},\"dataProvider\":{\"id\":\"string\"},\"permission\":{\"access\":\"string\",\"dateRange\":{\"from\":\"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z\",\"to\":\"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z\"},\"frequency\":{\"repeats\":0,\"unit\":\"string\",\"value\":0}},\"purpose\":{\"description\":\"string\"},\"timestamp\":\"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z\",\"user\":{\"email\":\"string\",\"idNumber\":\"string\",\"idType\":\"string\",\"mobile\":\"string\"}},\"signature\":{\"signature\":\"string\"}},\"format\":\"pdf\",\"txnId\":\"f7f1469c-29b0-4325-9dfc-c567200a70f7\"}"

headers = {
    'X-APISETU-APIKEY': "REPLACE_KEY_VALUE",
    'content-type': "application/json"
    }

conn.request("POST", "/bhartiaxagi/v3/hlipc/certificate", payload, headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

api_call:
package main

import (
	"fmt"
	"strings"
	"net/http"
	"io/ioutil"
)

func main() {

	url := "https://apisetu.gov.in/bhartiaxagi/v3/hlipc/certificate"

	payload := strings.NewReader("{\"certificateParameters\":{\"FullName\":\"Sunil Kumar\",\"PolicyNumber\":\"J9132102\"},\"consentArtifact\":{\"consent\":{\"consentId\":\"ea9c43aa-7f5a-4bf3-a0be-e1caa24737ba\",\"data\":{\"id\":\"string\"},\"dataConsumer\":{\"id\":\"string\"},\"dataProvider\":{\"id\":\"string\"},\"permission\":{\"access\":\"string\",\"dateRange\":{\"from\":\"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z\",\"to\":\"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z\"},\"frequency\":{\"repeats\":0,\"unit\":\"string\",\"value\":0}},\"purpose\":{\"description\":\"string\"},\"timestamp\":\"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z\",\"user\":{\"email\":\"string\",\"idNumber\":\"string\",\"idType\":\"string\",\"mobile\":\"string\"}},\"signature\":{\"signature\":\"string\"}},\"format\":\"pdf\",\"txnId\":\"f7f1469c-29b0-4325-9dfc-c567200a70f7\"}")

	req, _ := http.NewRequest("POST", url, payload)

	req.Header.Add("X-APISETU-APIKEY", "REPLACE_KEY_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("content-type", "application/json")

	res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

	defer res.Body.Close()
	body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

	fmt.Println(res)
	fmt.Println(string(body))

}

api_call:
require 'uri'
require 'net/http'
require 'openssl'

url = URI("https://apisetu.gov.in/bhartiaxagi/v3/hlipc/certificate")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)
http.use_ssl = true
http.verify_mode = OpenSSL::SSL::VERIFY_NONE

request = Net::HTTP::Post.new(url)
request["X-APISETU-APIKEY"] = 'REPLACE_KEY_VALUE'
request["content-type"] = 'application/json'
request.body = "{\"certificateParameters\":{\"FullName\":\"Sunil Kumar\",\"PolicyNumber\":\"J9132102\"},\"consentArtifact\":{\"consent\":{\"consentId\":\"ea9c43aa-7f5a-4bf3-a0be-e1caa24737ba\",\"data\":{\"id\":\"string\"},\"dataConsumer\":{\"id\":\"string\"},\"dataProvider\":{\"id\":\"string\"},\"permission\":{\"access\":\"string\",\"dateRange\":{\"from\":\"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z\",\"to\":\"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z\"},\"frequency\":{\"repeats\":0,\"unit\":\"string\",\"value\":0}},\"purpose\":{\"description\":\"string\"},\"timestamp\":\"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z\",\"user\":{\"email\":\"string\",\"idNumber\":\"string\",\"idType\":\"string\",\"mobile\":\"string\"}},\"signature\":{\"signature\":\"string\"}},\"format\":\"pdf\",\"txnId\":\"f7f1469c-29b0-4325-9dfc-c567200a70f7\"}"

response = http.request(request)
puts response.read_body

<?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, [
  CURLOPT_URL => "https://apisetu.gov.in/bhartiaxagi/v3/hlipc/certificate",
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => "",
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 30,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => "POST",
  CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS => "{\"certificateParameters\":{\"FullName\":\"Sunil Kumar\",\"PolicyNumber\":\"J9132102\"},\"consentArtifact\":{\"consent\":{\"consentId\":\"ea9c43aa-7f5a-4bf3-a0be-e1caa24737ba\",\"data\":{\"id\":\"string\"},\"dataConsumer\":{\"id\":\"string\"},\"dataProvider\":{\"id\":\"string\"},\"permission\":{\"access\":\"string\",\"dateRange\":{\"from\":\"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z\",\"to\":\"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z\"},\"frequency\":{\"repeats\":0,\"unit\":\"string\",\"value\":0}},\"purpose\":{\"description\":\"string\"},\"timestamp\":\"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z\",\"user\":{\"email\":\"string\",\"idNumber\":\"string\",\"idType\":\"string\",\"mobile\":\"string\"}},\"signature\":{\"signature\":\"string\"}},\"format\":\"pdf\",\"txnId\":\"f7f1469c-29b0-4325-9dfc-c567200a70f7\"}",
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => [
    "X-APISETU-APIKEY: REPLACE_KEY_VALUE",
    "content-type: application/json"
  ],
]);

$response = curl_exec($curl);
$err = curl_error($curl);

curl_close($curl);

if ($err) {
  echo "cURL Error #:" . $err;
} else {
  echo $response;
}

api_call:
package main

import (
	"fmt"
	"strings"
	"net/http"
	"io/ioutil"
)

func main() {

	url := "https://apisetu.gov.in/bhartiaxagi/v3/tripc/certificate"

	payload := strings.NewReader("{\"certificateParameters\":{\"FullName\":\"Sunil Kumar\",\"PolicyNumber\":\"J9132102\"},\"consentArtifact\":{\"consent\":{\"consentId\":\"ea9c43aa-7f5a-4bf3-a0be-e1caa24737ba\",\"data\":{\"id\":\"string\"},\"dataConsumer\":{\"id\":\"string\"},\"dataProvider\":{\"id\":\"string\"},\"permission\":{\"access\":\"string\",\"dateRange\":{\"from\":\"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z\",\"to\":\"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z\"},\"frequency\":{\"repeats\":0,\"unit\":\"string\",\"value\":0}},\"purpose\":{\"description\":\"string\"},\"timestamp\":\"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z\",\"user\":{\"email\":\"string\",\"idNumber\":\"string\",\"idType\":\"string\",\"mobile\":\"string\"}},\"signature\":{\"signature\":\"string\"}},\"format\":\"pdf\",\"txnId\":\"f7f1469c-29b0-4325-9dfc-c567200a70f7\"}")

	req, _ := http.NewRequest("POST", url, payload)

	req.Header.Add("X-APISETU-APIKEY", "REPLACE_KEY_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("content-type", "application/json")

	res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

	defer res.Body.Close()
	body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

	fmt.Println(res)
	fmt.Println(string(body))

}

require 'uri'
require 'net/http'
require 'openssl'

url = URI("https://apisetu.gov.in/bhartiaxagi/v3/tripc/certificate")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)
http.use_ssl = true
http.verify_mode = OpenSSL::SSL::VERIFY_NONE

request = Net::HTTP::Post.new(url)
request["X-APISETU-APIKEY"] = 'REPLACE_KEY_VALUE'
request["content-type"] = 'application/json'
request.body = "{\"certificateParameters\":{\"FullName\":\"Sunil Kumar\",\"PolicyNumber\":\"J9132102\"},\"consentArtifact\":{\"consent\":{\"consentId\":\"ea9c43aa-7f5a-4bf3-a0be-e1caa24737ba\",\"data\":{\"id\":\"string\"},\"dataConsumer\":{\"id\":\"string\"},\"dataProvider\":{\"id\":\"string\"},\"permission\":{\"access\":\"string\",\"dateRange\":{\"from\":\"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z\",\"to\":\"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z\"},\"frequency\":{\"repeats\":0,\"unit\":\"string\",\"value\":0}},\"purpose\":{\"description\":\"string\"},\"timestamp\":\"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z\",\"user\":{\"email\":\"string\",\"idNumber\":\"string\",\"idType\":\"string\",\"mobile\":\"string\"}},\"signature\":{\"signature\":\"string\"}},\"format\":\"pdf\",\"txnId\":\"f7f1469c-29b0-4325-9dfc-c567200a70f7\"}"

response = http.request(request)
puts response.read_body

  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => "",
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,

import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("apisetu.gov.in")

payload = "{\"certificateParameters\":{\"FullName\":\"Sunil Kumar\",\"PolicyNumber\":\"J9132102\"},\"consentArtifact\":{\"consent\":{\"consentId\":\"ea9c43aa-7f5a-4bf3-a0be-e1caa24737ba\",\"data\":{\"id\":\"string\"},\"dataConsumer\":{\"id\":\"string\"},\"dataProvider\":{\"id\":\"string\"},\"permission\":{\"access\":\"string\",\"dateRange\":{\"from\":\"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z\",\"to\":\"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z\"},\"frequency\":{\"repeats\":0,\"unit\":\"string\",\"value\":0}},\"purpose\":{\"description\":\"string\"},\"timestamp\":\"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z\",\"user\":{\"email\":\"string\",\"idNumber\":\"string\",\"idType\":\"string\",\"mobile\":\"string\"}},\"signature\":{\"signature\":\"string\"}},\"format\":\"pdf\",\"txnId\":\"f7f1469c-29b0-4325-9dfc-c567200a70f7\"}"

headers = {
    'X-APISETU-APIKEY': "REPLACE_KEY_VALUE",
    'content-type': "application/json"
    }

conn.request("POST", "/bhartiaxagi/v3/twipc/certificate", payload, headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

package main

import (
	"fmt"
	"strings"
	"net/http"
	"io/ioutil"
)

func main() {

	url := "https://apisetu.gov.in/bhartiaxagi/v3/twipc/certificate"

	req, _ := http.NewRequest("POST", url, payload)

    ],

] as [String : Any]

let postData = JSONSerialization.data(withJSONObject: parameters, options: [])

let request = NSMutableURLRequest(url: NSURL(string: "https://apisetu.gov.in/bhartiaxagi/v3/twipc/certificate")! as URL,

request.httpMethod = "POST"

request.httpBody = postData as Data
